en: Enable AutoBattler
zh: 启用自动战斗

en: Enable Camera Smoothing
zh: 启用相机平滑

en: Camera Smoothing Speed
zh: 相机平滑速度

en: Item Weight
zh: 物品权重

en: Projectile Weight
zh: 射弹权重

en: Tree Weight
zh: 树木权重

en: Boss Weight
zh: Boss权重

en: Wall bumper Weight
zh: 防撞墙权重

en: Egg Weight
zh: 蛋权重

en: Wall Bumper Distance
zh: 防撞墙距离

en: Enable AI Visualization
zh: 启用 AI 可视化

en: Show AI Marker
zh: 显示 AI 标记

en: Enable the AutoBattler.  When activated a bot will take control of the game during the wave attempting to keep an optimals distance from enemies and projectiles.
zh: 启用自动战斗。激活后，机器人将在波次期间控制游戏，试图与敌人和射弹保持最佳距离。

en: Enable Visualizations for the AI.  When active, elements that the bot cares about will be highlighted with bigger highlights for objects the bot cares about more.
zh: 启用 AI 的可视化功能。激活后，机器人关心的元素将以更大的高亮显示，对于机器人更关心的对象，高亮会更明显。

en: Show a marker next to the player when the AI is Active.  This is intended for streaming and video recording when you want to highlight the fact that a human is not in control of the game.
zh: 当 AI 处于活动状态时，在玩家旁边显示一个标记。当你想要强调人类无法控制游戏的事实时，这适用于流媒体和视频录制。

en: Enable Camera smoothing.  Many find the AI's sudden movements painful to follow.  Smoothing prevents the camera from being hard snapped to the player's position.
zh: 启用相机平滑。许多人发现 AI 突然的移动很难跟随。平滑功能可以防止相机被硬性切换到玩家的位置。

en: The rate at which the smoothing camera will follow the player.
zh: 平滑相机跟随玩家的速率。

en: Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to gold pickups.
zh: 控制机器人被金币拾取物吸引的强度。

en: Controls how strongly the bot will be repelled by enemy projectiles.
zh: 控制机器人被敌方射弹击退的强度。

en: Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to trees.
zh: 控制机器人被树木吸引的强度。

en: Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to bosses.
zh: 控制机器人被首领吸引的强度。

en: Controls how strongly the bot will be repelled by walls.
zh: 控制机器人被墙壁排斥的强度。

en: Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to unhatched eggs.
zh: 控制机器人被未孵化的蛋吸引的强度。

en: Controls the minimum distance to a wall the bot will try to maintain.
zh: 控制机器人试图保持的与墙壁的最小距离。
